description: Weekly laboratory exercises involving experiments related to course content, requiring prelab preparation and collaboration with a partner. Includes 8 labs with immediate prelab feedback and in-class marking.
Two invigilated tests (weeks 3 and 5) assessing weeks 1-4 content. Each test includes 4 questions, lasts 40 minutes, and uses practice question banks with feedback for preparation.
Two invigilated tests (weeks 8 and 10) assessing weeks 5,7-9 content. Each test includes 4 questions, lasts 40 minutes, and uses practice question banks with feedback for preparation.
